description: This table contains history of merge/unmerge info received via FHIR from another organization.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RCVD_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of update when merge/unmerge info is received.

columns.name: ORG_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: The unique identifier for an organization that sent merge/unmerge information for the patient.

columns.name: SRC_PAT_FHIR_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Other organization's original source patient FHIR ID.

columns.name: MERGE_UNMERGE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Other organization's merge/unmerge event instant for this patient.

columns.name: MERGE_ACTION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Other organization's merge/unmerge action type for this patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Merge


Unmerge

columns.name: RVCD_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of update when merge/unmerge info is received in the local time.

columns.name: MERGE_UNMERGE_DTTM
columns.description: Other organization's merge/unmerge event instant for this patient in the local time.
